participant_1.background:
I don't dye my hair.
I am single and live with my dog, who is a great listener.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
ferrari is my favorite car company.
I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.

participant_2.background:
I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
I like to eat soft foods that are easy to digest when I am confined to my bed.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
my cat s name is leroy jenkins.

content.text: I am doing well! How are you doing?
I am well! I am a trauma surgeon and I love my job.
That is great! What is your favorite part about your job?
I like helping people and I like the adrenaline rush.
I can imagine that it is very rewarding.
Yes, it is. I also like the fact that I am able to make a difference in people's lives.
That is a very noble profession.
Thank you. It is what I love doing. What do you do for a living?
I am a painter and I love my job as well.
That is so cool! I love art. Do you have a studio?
Yes, I do. I have a home studio where I can create my art.
That is great! I would love to see it sometime.
Sure! I would be happy to show you.
Thank you! I would love to see your work.
